name: Kyoto, Japan
description: Ancient capital of Japan featuring stunning temples, traditional gardens, geisha culture, and seasonal beauty. Experience cherry blossoms in spring, vibrant autumn colors, and peaceful zen gardens year-round.

name: Santorini, Greece
description: Iconic Greek island with whitewashed buildings, blue-domed churches, and breathtaking sunsets over the Aegean Sea. Perfect for romantic getaways, wine tasting, and beach relaxation.

name: Reykjavik, Iceland
description: Gateway to Iceland's natural wonders including geysers, waterfalls, glaciers, and the Northern Lights. Modern city with vibrant culture, unique cuisine, and geothermal hot springs.

name: Marrakech, Morocco
description: Vibrant city of souks, palaces, and gardens. Experience exotic spices, traditional hammams, stunning architecture, and the energy of Jemaa el-Fnaa square.

name: Banff, Canada
description: Mountain paradise in the Canadian Rockies with turquoise lakes, hiking trails, wildlife, and world-class skiing. Perfect for outdoor enthusiasts and nature lovers.
